hymn.title: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name (Short)

layout.singingstanza: All hail the pow'r of Je -- sus' name! Be -- fore Him pros -- trate fall; With one ac -- cord His praise pro -- claim, And crown Him Lord of all! With one ac -- cord His praise pro -- claim, And crown Him Lord of all!

lyrics.stanza: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name! Before Him prostrate fall; With one accord His praise proclaim, And crown Him Lord of all!
Ye saints redeemed from Adam's race, Ye ransomed from the fall, Hail Him who saves you by His grace, And crown Him Lord of all.
Tell forth the only Name that's giv'n On which we now may call, The Name adored by hosts in heav'n, And crown Him Lord of all.
In glory all the ransomed throng Soon at His feet shall fall; Join in the blest eternal song, And crown Him Lord of all.
(Repeat the last two lines of each stanza)
